Please find attached the following weblink:

http://www.casde.iitb.ac.in/MD=
O/specific-studies/Wing-opt-modified-1-
05.ppt

to a PowerPoint file contai=
ning an MDO (Multi-Discipline Optimization) 
presentation based upon experi=
ences derived from an aircraft wing MDO 
at the Dept. of Aerospace Engineer=
ing, IIT Bombay, India ( 
http://www.casde.iitb.ac.in/MDO/ ). I believe thi=
s presentation is 
applicable to NEAT user's not based upon the subject MDO=
 task, but 
rather based upon the experience-based observations regarding t=
he 
importance of maintaining history (see pages 9, 20, 39, 40 and 92). 
Th=
eir conclusion was that the implementation of a history block reduced 
comp=
utational requirements by a factor of (10). This is consistent with 
my own=
 experiences with NEAT, in instances in which the fitness 
evaluation was c=
omputationally non-trivial (i.e. most useful real-world 
problems).

Prior =
posts have outlined various useful libraries applicable to 
implementation =
of a history functionality w/ NEAT.
